title: Cabinet Secretariat Leak
description: Leaked confidential document from India's Cabinet Secretariat. Internal gov files exposed. Top-tier gov access.

title: Indian Army Candidates Dump
description: Database leak of Indian Army candidates. Names, details, recruitment data — fully exposed.

title: Army Recruitment Leak #2
description: Second batch of Indian Army candidate info. Recruitment files, personal data — leaked and verified.

title: Army Recruitment Leak #3
description: Third set of Indian Army applicant data. Massive exposure of sensitive military recruitment records.

title: Debts Tribunal Cause List Leak
description: Internal cause list from Debts Recovery Tribunal Jabalpur. Court schedule and case metadata leaked.

title: India Bank – January Financial Sheet Leak
description: Leaked internal calculation sheet for January from India Bank. Includes payroll data, departmental budgets, and financial planning details.

title: India Bank – September Financial Sheet Leak
description: Confidential September sheet from India Bank’s finance system. Shows expense tracking, fund allocation, and salary breakdowns.

title: India Bank – December Financial Sheet Leak
description: Internal December financial records from India Bank exposed. Details monthly allocations, payouts, and budgeting strategy.

title: India Bank – Data Bank Leak
description: Full internal databank dump from India Bank. Includes sensitive records, structured finance data, and backend database structure.
